help.title: HOW TO PLAY0
help.txt3:
If the ball finishes in the middle 
box you are taken to the 
bonus game.0
help.txt2:
Light up 3 banana segments to
win that prize.0
help.txt:
Press the monkey to get him to 
release the ball into the board.
You have 7 balls to drop.0
